title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 651.6 - Annual report on fraud cases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 651.6 - Annual report on fraud cases

State Regulations
(a) Social services districts shall submit an
annual report concerning all AABD, family assistance, safety net assistance and
medical assistance cases suspected of involving fraud, setting forth the
disposition of such cases, including the action, if any, taken by the
appropriate law enforcement officials. Such report shall be made on form RS-118
prepared and submitted in accordance with the instructions of the
office. (b) The report prescribed
by this section shall be submitted to the department on or before July 20th of
each year, for the fiscal year ended the next preceding June 30th. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
651.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
